profile.post_content:
Flyer is an all media agency that develops services and solutions between technology and communication.

We have acquired extended experience about online and offline communication strategies and planning, web design and development, live video and performances, so we can offer products and services ranging from creating and promoting your web presence, to organizing and supporting live events and visual performances.

We are the right partner for everyone wishing to increase their business by investing in technology and communication with an original, creative and innovative approach.

We sum up skills, professionalism and imagination. We are a team of creative people, technology experts, consultants, communicators, video-artists and performers: our aim is to understand the changes taking place in our world and propose original and customized solutions for them.

We can offer new, refreshing ideas for an open and innovative use of technology. We combine strategy and creativity to define and improve the relationship with the environment in which we operate.

profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box:
Web & Mobile

Flyer communication offers creativity, consulting, development, tools, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies and their events: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-1-html-box-original:
Web & Mobile

Flyer communication offers creativity, consulting, development, tools, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies and their events: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-title: Siti Web, Installazioni Interattive e App
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box:
Live Visuals

From the experience of the Lab projects as FLxER, one of the first software to manage the live video and then from 2004 with LPM, now the largest event of Audio Visuals Performing Arts, Flyer is able to offer creativity, contents and services for small and major cutting edge events.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-2-html-box-original:
Live Visuals

From the experience of the Lab projects as FLxER, one of the first software to manage the live video and then from 2004 with LPM, now the largest event of Audio Visuals Performing Arts, Flyer is able to offer creativity, contents and services for small and major cutting edge events.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-3-html-box:
Learning

The learning area is born from years of experience of Flyer in Audio Visuals Performing Arts events and web-mobile communication that has allowed the development of this new spin off relying on the preparation and practical experience of its teachers.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-3-html-box-original:
Learning

The learning area is born from years of experience of Flyer in Audio Visuals Performing Arts events and web-mobile communication that has allowed the development of this new spin off relying on the preparation and practical experience of its teachers.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-4-html-box:
Lab

In addition to carrying out its ordinary activities, Flyer communication have distinguished in the last decade for the innovative, original and experimental of his designs and creativity, born in the laboratory experimental research Flyer Lab, and become the result of important prizes and awards, as well as the protagonists of prestigious artistic and cultural cutting edge events of international significance.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-1-col-4-html-box-original:
Lab

In addition to carrying out its ordinary activities, Flyer communication have distinguished in the last decade for the innovative, original and experimental of his designs and creativity, born in the laboratory experimental research Flyer Lab, and become the result of important prizes and awards, as well as the protagonists of prestigious artistic and cultural cutting edge events of international significance.

Read more
profile.wpcf-row-2-col-1-html-box:
Flyer communication from over ten years is providing advice, services and products related to the Web: websites, web-based applications, content editing&creation, online communities and social networks management, website stats analytics reports, general maintenance and support. Flyer communication can offer help during the whole life of a web project: concept and planning, design and development, content creation and updating, hardware and software assistance. Flyer communication relies on a dedicated team and serves a range of scalable products and services, enabling to choose from basic projects to advanced features and technologies. From over ten years, Flyer communication’s core business is the Web: for an overview of our work during all this time, please see our portfolio. For more information about what we can offer, please see our web services and products details.

Websites for small, medium and large businesses
Modular web projects, with basic or advanced features. Flyer can assist and advise each type of customer and company, with the aim to offer a tailored solution.

Web content and online communities moderation
Production and adaptation of web content. Administration, management and promotion of online communities, including social networks.

Maintenance and reporting
Flyer can manage and update the site as delegated by the customer, and provide reports developed on the basis of user access to Google Analytics.

Accessibility
Development of accessible code, in line with W3C standards. Development of accessible applications and websites created entirely in Adobe Flash.

profile.wpcf-row-2-col-2-html-box:
FLV – Flyer Live Visuals is the new professional offer in visual communication, the only one in Italy totally focused on live video in its various applications. Live Visuals’ projects are born from the convergence between art and cutting edge technology, and result in a wide range of video solutions, ranging over contents production to set design of visual sceneries. Every work results from passion and decades of experience in the field of live video, vjing, visual communication, event organization. We work with experienced and creative people, from all over the world, to arrange quality audiovisual shows. Live Visuals works with experienced and creative people from international scene and we can produce audiovisual shows in various contexts and situations and contexts.

Advertising and promotion
Live Visuals offers solutions to advertise your business in an innovative and unconventional way, using alternative media. Interacting with customer needs, Live Visuals creatively reworks the brand identity and moved it on electronic screens, LCD monitors, plasma displays, LED panels, video walls and interactive monitors.

Events, conventions, meetings, openings, party
Live Visuals proposes ideas to enrich your event, through the creation of deeply emotional and fascinating visual sceneries: live visuals, video installations, audio-video performances, video-mapping operations.

Theater, show and entertainment
Live Visulas play with virtual digital sets interacting in real time with the content of the show and the actors, without relying on post-multimedia products and develops solutions for a smart video direction, dynamic and easy to manage in real time.

Culture, Institutions, Art
Live Visuals promotes and supports spreading of video art, through experimental projects born from the convergence of avant-garde art and new technologies.

profile.wpcf-row-2-col-3-html-box: Flyer Communication, new media agency attiva a Roma dal 1996, specializzata nello sviluppo di servizi incentrati sulla comunicazione e nella produzione e organizzazione di progetti sperimentali nati dalla convergenza tra arte d’avanguardia e nuove tecnologie. Nel 2011 nasce Flyer Formazione, la nuova costola di Flyer. Dalla necessità di inserire persone dotate di esperienze pratiche sul campo Flyer lancia su Roma i corsi di formazione su iphone, vvvv, low 5, 3ds, videomapping e new media in genere. I corsi tenuti da professionisti del settore cercano, appunto, di colmare la lacuna formativa necessaria ad uno studente per essere davvero pronto per lavorare fattivamente in una realtà aziendale o realizzare i priopri progetti in modo individuale! Flyer Communication, oltre per la attività di avanguardia nel campo del Social Networking e della comunicazione web ed alla neo attività di formazione specialistica si distingue nel settore del live video come punto di riferimento internazionale per vj e video artisti di tutto il mondo, grazie al successo di progetti come FLxER.net ed LPM – Live Performers Meeting. FLxER è un free software per mixare grafica vettoriale, audio, video, testo e media interattivi, nato nel 2001 come strumento risolutivo e risposta naturale alla necessità di fondere le arti espressive di un collettivo di creativi digitali. FLxER.net è anche una community di oltre 12.000 vj e videoartisti che condividono le proprie produzioni, più di 6000 video, in una sorta di video blog (www.flxer.net). LPM – Live Performers Meeting, è un meeting internazionale per artisti, esperti ed appassionati di veejaying, visual e video live performance, nato nel 2004 col proposito di rispondere all’esigenza di creare un ambito spazio-temporale di riferimento nel quale fosse possibile incontrarsi, conoscersi e condividere le esperienze legate al vjing (www.liveperformersmeeting.net). In una delle sue ultime edizioni, LPM ha ospitato 382 artisti provenienti da diversi Paesi del mondo: Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bulgaria, Canada, Danimarca, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Macedonia, Messico, Olanda, Polonia, Portogallo, Repubblica Ceca, Spagna, Stati Uniti, Svezia,Turchia, Ungheria, Regno Unito, Uruguay, con 296 progetti tra performance, workshop e showcase.

FLxER.net è anche una community di oltre 12.000 vj e videoartisti che condividono le proprie produzioni, più di 6000 video, in una sorta di video blog (www.flxer.net). LPM - Live Performers Meeting, è un meeting internazionale per artisti, esperti ed appassionati di veejaying, visual e video live performance, nato nel 2004 col proposito di rispondere all'esigenza di creare un ambito spazio-temporale di riferimento nel quale fosse possibile incontrarsi, conoscersi e condividere le esperienze legate al vjing (www.liveperformersmeeting.net). In una delle sue ultime edizioni, LPM ha ospitato 382 artisti provenienti da diversi Paesi del mondo: Argentina, Australia, Austria, Bulgaria, Canada, Danimarca, Francia, Germania, Grecia, Irlanda, Italia, Lettonia, Macedonia, Messico, Olanda, Polonia, Portogallo, Repubblica Ceca, Spagna, Stati Uniti, Svezia,Turchia, Ungheria, Regno Unito, Uruguay, con 296 progetti tra performance, workshop e showcase.
profile.wpcf-row-2-col-4-html-box:
(Italiano)

Interaction Design

Oltre a svolgere la sua attività ordinaria, Flyer si è contraddistinta negli ultimi venti anni per il carattere innovativo, originale e sperimentale dei suoi progetti, nati all’interno del laboratorio sperimentale di ricerca, e divenuti frutto di importanti premi e riconoscimenti, oltre che protagonisti di prestigiosi eventi artistici e culturali a carattere internazionale.

Leggi tutto

posttype_web.post_content_original: Flyer communication offers consulting, development, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.
posttype_web.meta_description: Flyer communication offers consulting, development, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

content.rendered:
New website for the project!

The contents of the site are also available for smartphones.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, the artists and the installations and performances, as well as the many social activities of the project.

Born from the collaboration between Fusolab, Flyer and Liceo Scientifico Statale Francesco D’Assisi, the project – winner of the “Scuola attiva la cultura” call launched by MIBACT within the Cultura Futuro Urbano plan – aims to enhance the cultural paths already present in the area with the ambition to create new ones.

Site created entirely in WordPress and the Firebase and MapBox APIs.

content.rendered:
New web site for the new edition of Live Performers Meeting, LPM 2020 Rome!

The contents of the site are also available via smartphone.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, artists and performances, and view materials and content of previous editions.

Web site fully done in NodeJS and the API of WordPress and AVnode.

content.rendered:
New website for the historical artistic collective FLxER!

The contents of the site are also available for smartphones.

On the site you can find information on the collective, on performances, installations, workshops, events and news, as well as download the famous live AV software.

Site made entirely in NodeJS and the WordPress and AVnode APIs.

results.news:
We have created an “EXTRA” webpage to keep you up to date with the activities of Flyer throughout the year: events in collaboration with our partners, workshops and performances presented by Flyer at international festivals, and news about the latest trends in the field of Audio Visuals Performing Arts an communication. Join us, and follow the community!!!

avnode.about:
Very interested in any kind of avant-garde, costume, music, art and experimentation, it is updated on all sorts of innovation in technology and communications.

In 1996 he founded and coordinates the various activities dealing Flyer Communication Srl well as the managerial tasks and strategic development of all applications Flash Flyer.

In 1999 he founded Shockart.net that quickly becomes a point of reference for the Web Art and especially for the productions in Shockwave Flash, features exhibitions in Rome, Valencia, San Francisco, New...
avnode.aboutFull:
Very interested in any kind of avant-garde, costume, music, art and experimentation, it is updated on all sorts of innovation in technology and communications.

In 1996 he founded and coordinates the various activities dealing Flyer Communication Srl well as the managerial tasks and strategic development of all applications Flash Flyer.

In 1999 he founded Shockart.net that quickly becomes a point of reference for the Web Art and especially for the productions in Shockwave Flash, features exhibitions in Rome, Valencia, San Francisco, New York.

In 2001 he created a AV mixer FLxER based on Flash tecnology, that is presented in the most varied occasions, it is used to mix vector graphics, audio, video, text and interactive media, in live performance.

From 2002 to 2005 taught at the IED as teacher in the Master in Web Design and Strategy, and in 2006 taught "Flash" in the course of Graphics for three years.

He has also edited several interventions in the Faculty of Engineering, University of Sannio, Department of Linguistic Practices and Text Analysis at the University of Bari, in the Faculty of Humanities, University of Tor Vergata, University of Perugia , at the Biennale of Young Artists of Athens (2003), the Flash Forward in San Francisco and New York, the Center for Studies in Szentendre (Budapest), at Sonar in Barcelona, the RESFEST of Rome, the Biennial of Valencia, the Faculty of Fine Arts in Barcelona at the Galleria d'Arte Moderna e Contemporanea di Bergamo, the Galleria d'Arte Moderna in Rome, at the Faculty of Architecture of Wisdom.

In 2004 he won the prize Bardi IBM Web award with the site of the Photograpy International Festival of Rome in the same year he started writing for Next Exit magazine and others on the Web.

In 2006, Achille Bonito Oliva gives the ABO Silver, an award for having outstanding accomplishments of Web Art, as one of the protagonists of international contemporary art.
